Author: bitterviaproxy
Text: ED tumblr just honestly seems like a cult. It's all "Stay safe! ğŸ’–ğŸ’–ğŸ’–" under a list of restriction rules/purge tips. As much as people write "I am not responsible for anyone using these methods" on their shitty advice posts, they lure people into this weird cult behaviour by promoting cutesy aesthetics of underweight models brandishing cigarettes in black and white thumbnails...  This sub on the other hand just feels upfront and genuine about the struggles of these disorders. No-one is trying to put rose-tinted glasses over anything and people are really supportive â¤
